roleset.name: to reside or be present in

example.name: autogen1
example.text: A medium-sized one in Brooklyn , it says , could be altered to house up to 1,000 inmates at a lower cost than building a new prison in upstate New York .

example.name: autogen2
example.text: The center , close to Hong Kong 's border with China , will be ready today and will be able to house 1,000 inmates
example.arg: The center , close to Hong Kong 's border with China , ---> *-1
